item.title: 高盛的科斯汀称，S&P 500 强企业将打破低盈利标准
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：US companies are set to enjoy a better-than-expected earnings season as a robust economy and a solid outlook for artificial intelligence have left estimates looking too low, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 尼日利亚将对外国股票投资者征收三倍的资本收益税
item.description: 尼日利亚将对外国股票投资者征收三倍的资本利得税，这引发了人们的担忧，担心此举可能会引发这个西非国家股市的抛售，而这个国家的股市今年已经上涨了近 40%。【原文：Nigeria is tripling capital gains tax for foreign equity investors, raising concerns that the move may trigger a sell-off in the West African nation’s stock market, which is up almost 40% this year.】

item.title: 巴克莱股票指标阻止 9 月反弹，暗示将有更多涨幅
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的一项股票指标正确预测了 9 月份的涨势，并对季节性疲软表示担忧，据此判断，美国股市的多月连涨势头有望延续。【原文：A multi-month winning streak in US stocks is poised to continue based on an equity indicator from Barclays Plc that correctly predicted September’s rally in the face of concern over seasonal weakness.】

item.title: 苏尼尔-米塔尔的 Bharti Telecom 酝酿创纪录的 17 亿美元债券交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度亿万富翁苏尼尔-米塔尔（Sunil Mittal）的巴蒂电信有限公司（Bharti Telecom Ltd.）正在考虑最早于下周发行约 1,500 亿卢比（17 亿美元）的债券。【原文：Indian billionaire Sunil Mittal’s Bharti Telecom Ltd. is considering to offer about 150 billion rupees ($1.7 billion) of bonds as early as next week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度航空公司检查飞往英国航班的应急电源使用情况
item.description: 印度航空公司在周日的一份声明中说，上周末一架飞往英国的波音787梦想飞机在空中启动了紧急供电系统，印度航空公司因此停飞了这架飞机进行检查。【原文：Air India grounded a Boeing 787 Dreamliner for checks, after an emergency power system got activated midair in an UK-bound flight over the weekend, the airline said in a statement Sunday.】

item.title: LG 印度首次公开募股据称将吸引阿布扎比、挪威和新加坡财富基金的青睐
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，LG 电子公司印度分公司的首次公开募股吸引了阿布扎比、挪威和新加坡的主权财富基金。【原文：LG Electronics Inc.’s initial public offering of its India arm has attracted the sovereign wealth funds of Abu Dhabi, Norway and Singapore, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI 的公告在其避而不谈的股票市场掀起波澜
item.description: OpenAI 可能没有公开上市，但这家全球最有价值的初创公司正在股票市场上掀起越来越大的波澜。【原文：OpenAI may not be publicly traded, but the world’s most valuable startup is increasingly making waves in the stock market.】

item.title: 英国建筑公司在预算案的寒蝉效应中再次萎缩
item.description: 一项备受关注的调查显示，预算案出台前的不确定性正在拖累建筑业，英国建筑商正处于金融危机以来最长衰退期的边缘。【原文：UK builders are on the brink of recording their longest downturn since the financial crisis, according to a closely watched survey that showed that uncertainty in the run-up to the budget is dragging on the sector.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯和莱恩表示目前没有改变利率的紧迫性
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）的两位最高决策者描述了通胀前景，认为通胀不会面临任何方向的普遍风险，这表明他们暂时没有移动利率的倾向。【原文：Two of the European Central Bank’s top policymakers described an inflation outlook that doesn’t face prevailing risks in either direction, suggesting that they have no inclination to move interest rates for now.】

item.title: 马来西亚债券销售因利率和供应问题遭遇 2025 年以来最弱需求
item.description: 马来西亚政府债券的拍卖吸引了今年以来最弱的需求，原因是交易商降低了对降息的预期，而企业发行债券则使投资者的兴趣从主权债务上转移开来。【原文：An auction of Malaysian government bonds drew the weakest demand this year, as traders pared expectations for rate cuts and corporate issuances shifted investor interest away from sovereign debt.】

item.title: 阿布扎比房地产巨头押注廉价住宅和私人信贷
item.description: 在过去的二十年里，阿布扎比最大的开发商主要致力于建造高档住宅。但在长期繁荣之后，阿尔达地产公司（Aldar Properties PJSC）资金充裕，现在正将目光投向经济适用房、低成本学校，甚至是私人信贷基金。【原文：For the last two decades, Abu Dhabi’s largest developer has focused largely on building upscale homes. But flush with cash after a lengthy boom, Aldar Properties PJSC is now setting its sights on affordable housing, lower cost schools and even a private credit fund.】

item.title: 奥托博克将进行一年多来德国最大的首次公开募股
item.description: 预计奥托博克公司（Ottobock SE）在法兰克福的首次公开募股定价将达到市场预期的最高水平，从而使这家医疗假肢制造商有望成为一年多来德国最大的首次公开募股公司。【原文：Ottobock SE is expected to price its Frankfurt initial public offering at the top of the marketed range, putting the maker of medical prosthetics on pace for the biggest German IPO in more than a year.】

item.title: 法国总理勒科尔努辞职，法国资产暴跌，欧元下挫
item.description: 法国总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科尔努突然辞职后，法国股市暴跌，投资者猜测，要解决政治危机，重新选举不可避免。【原文：French markets tumbled after the sudden resignation of Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu, with investors speculating that fresh elections are inevitable to solve the political crisis.】

item.title: 香港建筑商丽新完成 4.45 亿美元贷款再融资交易
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，丽新发展有限公司已获得 34.6 亿港元（4.45 亿美元）的再融资贷款，这为这家香港建筑商在应对香港房地产长期低迷导致的流动性紧缩问题时提供了一些喘息空间。【原文：Lai Sun Development Co. has obtained a HK$3.46 billion ($445 million) loan refinancing deal, according to people familiar with the matter, giving the Hong Kong builder some breathing room as it grapples with a liquidity squeeze fueled by the city’s prolonged property slump.】

item.title: 世界头号大米买家菲律宾计划延长进口禁令
item.description: 菲律宾计划将大米进口禁令广泛延长至四月，以支持世界上最大的大米买家的农民，此举可能会对全球大米价格造成进一步压力。【原文：The Philippines plans to broadly extend its ban on rice imports until April to support farmers in the world’s biggest buyer of the grain, a move that’s likely to put further pressure on global prices.】

item.title: Adnoc 就 120 亿欧元的 Covestro 交易调查向欧盟提出补救措施
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. has offered a slate of concessions to address European Union concerns over its €12 billion ($14 billion) takeover of Covestro AG.】

item.title: 高市获胜后，日本现金充裕的企业可能面临压力
item.description: 一些策略师认为，支持刺激政策的保守派高市真奈赢得大选后，日本现金充裕的企业可能会感到压力，因为她过去曾对企业持有过多现金表示过担忧。【原文：Cash-rich companies in Japan may feel the heat after the election win of the pro-stimulus conservative Sanae Takaichi, as she has in the past expressed concerns about excess corporate cash holdings, according to some strategists.】

item.title: 朝日啤酒在遭受严重网络攻击后恢复在日本的供应
item.description: 朝日集团控股有限公司（Asahi Group Holdings Ltd.）10 月 2 日重新启动了其在日本的六家啤酒厂，此前该啤酒制造商曾因网络攻击被迫停止生产和运输数日。【原文：Asahi Group Holdings Ltd. restarted six of its breweries in Japan on Oct. 2 after a cyberattack forced the beer maker to halt production and shipments for several days.】

item.title: 瑞士交易所集团将把数字资产部门 SDX 纳入公司内部
item.description: 瑞士和西班牙证券交易所运营商 SIX Group AG 正在退出其数字资产交易所品牌 SDX，并在内部吸收该部门的业务，因为主流金融公司正在加强在传统市场中使用区块链的计划。【原文：Swiss and Spanish stock exchange operator SIX Group AG is retiring its digital asset exchange brand SDX and absorbing the division’s operations in-house, as mainstream financial firms ramp up plans to use blockchain in traditional markets.】

item.title: 法国总理辞职，法国股市领跌欧洲股市
item.description: 法国总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科尔努辞职，引发了对该国进一步政治动荡的担忧，法国股市创下盘中新低。【原文：French stocks hit a session low as Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu resigned, sparking worries about further political turmoil in the country.】

item.title: 乌兹别克斯坦考虑利用伊斯兰金融和新的环境、社会和公司债券实现债务多样化
item.description: 乌兹别克斯坦是中亚第二大经济体，在成功进入可持续债券市场后，正努力使其债务发行多样化。【原文：Uzbekistan, Central Asia’s second biggest economy, is seeking to diversify its debt issuance after successful forays into the sustainable bond market.】

item.title: 橡树支持海湾房地产基金 Arzan 推动私人信贷发展
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）正在为一家中东酒店业投资者提供支持，因为该地区的私人信贷兴趣正日益浓厚。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management is backing a Middle East hospitality investor as private credit interest in the region is gaining traction.】

item.title: 阿斯特拉和第一制药称药物可延长乳腺癌患者的生命
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）和第一三共公司（Daiichi Sankyo）的药物 Datroway 帮助患有特别难治的乳腺癌患者延长了寿命。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc and Daiichi Sankyo’s drug Datroway helped breast cancer patients with a particularly hard to treat form of the disease live longer.】

item.title: 丹麦加强油轮检查以阻止俄罗斯影子舰队
item.description: 丹麦正在加强对通过其水域的油轮的监管，因为欧洲的目标是帮助俄罗斯逃避制裁的影子船队。【原文：Denmark is tightening regulation of oil tankers passing through its waters as Europe targets the shadow fleet that’s helping Russia skirt sanctions.】

item.title: 法国-德国 10 年期收益率差距扩大至 1 月以来最大值
item.description: 在埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统的新连续性内阁引发了对新政府可行性的担忧之后，法国债务相对于更安全的德国同类国家的溢价升至九个月来的最高点。【原文：The premium on French debt over safer German peers rose to a nine-month high after President Emmanuel Macron’s new continuity cabinet sparked concerns for viability of the new government.】

item.title: 欧盟开始向欧洲债券回购市场注入过剩现金
item.description: 欧盟已开始在回购市场上借出多余现金，以换取债券，从而为正面临债务供应增加问题的投资者注入了新的欧元。【原文：The European Union has started lending out its excess cash in the repo market in exchange for bonds, providing a fresh injection of euros to investors grappling with increasing debt supply.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁因美国关税再次下调业绩展望，预计销量下降
item.description: 阿斯顿-马丁拉贡达全球控股公司今年第二次下调了业绩展望，理由是美国关税的影响和更广泛的经济挑战阻碍了需求。【原文：Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc pared back its outlook for a second time this year, citing the impact of US tariffs and broader economic challenges holding back demand.】

item.title: 条款显示，Verisure 首次公开募股价格可能接近区间上限
item.description: 报警集团 Verisure Plc 的首次公开募股价格可能为 13.25 欧元（15.5 美元），这表明市场对欧洲三年来最大的一次上市需求强劲。【原文：The initial public offering of alarm group Verisure Plc is likely to price at €13.25 ($15.5) in a sign of strong demand for Europe’s largest listing in three years.】
